title: Champ Select Freezes when The match is about to begin (Mac)
body: When ever Im in champ select, after choosing and having the count down end, my client freezes and does not launch league, it just stops at 'The Match is About to Begin'. I have to manually close and reopen league and Im usually any where from 2-10 minutes late to the game and have suffered through countless Low Priority queues because of this. I am on a Mac. Thank you.

replies.body:
Oh hey, I think you have the same problem I've had for the past season.  Still no idea why it happens, but work arounds :D

- Play a custom game.  Just 1v0.  Load into the game, wait about 10s, then quit.  Then try playing normally.  This typically works for me.  

- It will load eventually, if you wait long enough.  Try playing a bot game, and just waiting out the freeze.  You should make it into the game in time before it starts.

Again, this is something I've been dealing with, and this is what's worked for me.  Good luck though.

So i tried it and when i tried to start is, after champ select it happened again, i restarted league and couldnt join the game.
Ok, ok.  You have to wait out the crash.  It'll take 5- min.  But eventually it'll let you load, and fixes the problem until you restart league.

Thanks ill try this right now

Regardless of Mac or Windows, the root cause may still be the same in this situation:  After Champ Select, your computer needs to connect to our individual game servers.  If something blocks this connection from taking place, then you won't see the Loading Screen.  In an effort to resolve this, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#section-mac).

Let me know if you are still experiencing issues!
Not the only one having the problem. It seems to be wide known. I'm at -10 LP because this game keeps freezing my client in ranked queue right after ban or even before. random times in the queue

Sadly i still am, I checked these before i postred

If nothing seems to help, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  One of our Tech Specialists should be able to work with you one-on-one and get this resolved.
